name: The Resumator
description: The Resumator designs the leading recruiting platform that enables you to swiftly find the best talent ideally suited to your business and position. With our innovative tools, scalable workflows and real-time insights, SMBs and fast-growing businesses can now hire with confidence.  The right talent is hard to find, and while you may not hire every day, you want to grow every day in big and small ways. As the pioneer of recruiting platforms and having helped businesses for over five years, The Resumator is primed to deliver what your require to accomplish your corporate goal – the talent to grow
